attributes.action: make all doctors surgeries provide an email prescription service
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: make all doctors surgeries provide an email prescription service as this will help people with Dyslexia to be able to put a repeat prescription in as it is very difficult to do so by phone as the name of medications is hard to ready & most people with Dyslexia are ashamed of there writing so try not to write things down email makes it easy I know it works as my surgery tried it out but they had there email address removed by the PTC
